Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the birth certificate provided is not real and has been altered.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the significance of the birth certificate, implying a connection between Ghislaine Maxwell, Donald Trump, and an alleged love child.
Understate: No biases of understating are evident in this claim.
Falters at times: No biases of faltering are evident in this claim.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a fake birth certificate and a Twitter account created immediately after Ghislaine Maxwell's arrest.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes a problematic assumption that the birth certificate is genuine and that it proves the existence of a biological son between Maxwell and Trump.
Exist alternative explanation: No biases of alternative explanations are evident in this claim.
